segments.text: Do you like watching the Winter Olympic Games ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . It's the tradition game in winter , and with good reason . Don't you like watching it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course I do . I love it . All the games are exciting and the competitors are respectable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . For various reasons , it takes more to hold a fierce game for Winter Olympics than it does for Summer Olympics . You know , the low temperature may cause many problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . What's the difference between the Winter Olympics and the Summer Olympics ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When the Olympic Games started in modern times , only summer events were included . When it grew popular , there came the Winter Olympic Games , which includes a variety of winter sports .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Then , what's your favorite winter sport ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Figure skating . In my eye , nothing beats it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you must know Shen Due and Hao Hongbo .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I didn't expect you to know them . But yes , I love them not only because of many medals they've won , but also because of many medals they've won , but also because of their spirits .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should go to talk with May . She is a big fan of them too .
segments.speaker: S1
